humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that metastatic adenocarcinoma is present in 2 out of 17 right axillary lymph nodes, as per Rule 12 (N1) in the provided list. This conclusion is supported by the report's statements L: 'METASTATIC ADENOCARCINOMA INVOLVING TWO (2) OUT OF SEVENTEEN (17) RIGHT. AXILLARY LYMPH NODES' and N: 'pN1'.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for a pathology report is determined by the number of lymph nodes involved and whether there is extracapsular extension. In this report, it is stated that 'METASTATIC ADENOCARCINOMA INVOLVING TWO (2) OUT OF SEVENTEEN (17) RIGHT AXILLARY LYMPH NODES, UP TO 6.0 CM WITH EXTRACAPSULAR EXTENSION, UP TO 4.0 CM (AA AND BB)'. This indicates that 2 out of 17 lymph nodes are involved and there is extracapsular extension. Therefore, the N stage is N1.
